      as release of 2.0.0, and it will be removed in 3.0.0, use ReplicationAdmin.addPeer(String, ReplicationPeerConfig) instead.

      Deprecated.

      private void ReplicationAdmin.checkNamespacesAndTableCfsConfigConflict(Set<String> namespaces, Map<TableName,? extends Collection<String>> tableCfs)
      Deprecated. 
      Set a namespace in the peer config means that all tables in this namespace will be replicated to the peer cluster.

      Deprecated.

      Deprecated.
